content:

Of course, I am open to discussing other terms and conditions, such as the length of the lease and any additional fees that may apply. However, please note that my primary concern is the rental price, and I am not willing to compromise on that.

If you agree to the rental price of 1,500 Euros per month, I would be happy to proceed with the negotiation and finalize the lease agreement. If you have any other questions or concerns, please feel free to ask.
